result.execSummary:
The defendant Exavier P Pettus was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal), an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 343.44(1)(b).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Bond of $85 appleid. Defendant granted a payment plan for fine/costs of $50 per month commencing 1/1/2016 on unpaid balance. Failure to pay may result in a commitment of -1- day for every $25 owed.

charges.descr: Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal)
